subject: Self Care
title: Setting Emotional Boundaries
description: Learn Setting Emotional Boundaries in one minute.

hook.text: Your friend vents to you daily. You feel drained but guilty for wanting space. The boundary is missing.

buildup.text: Emotional boundaries define where your responsibility for others' feelings ends and self-care begins.

discovery.text: Boundaries aren't walls. They're filters. They let connection in while keeping emotional exploitation out.

twist.text: People with high EQ set more boundaries, not fewer. Awareness of emotions includes knowing your own limits.

climax.text: 'I care about you, and I need to protect my energy right now.' That's a boundary spoken with love.

punchline.text: Boundaries protect relationships. They don't end them.

quiz.question: What are emotional boundaries?
options: Filters that allow connection while protecting against emotional drain
Signs that you don't care about others
